## Basic Information

### Welcome to the (Re)Entering Mentoring 2025 Workshop Series

This is our second iteration of offering (Re)Entering Mentoring as an online webinar series for the LTER network. Thank you so much for joining us, and committing some time this semester to mentorship. We are really looking forward to working and growing with you.

We have created this website to serve as a hub for information during and after the series, and more information will be added in the next two weeks. 

### Workshop Outline

**All sessions begin at 10am PT / 1pm ET and end at 11:30am PT / 2:30pm ET**

**Date**|**Topic**
:-----:|:-----:
April 17, 2025|Module 1: Aligning expectations 
April 24, 2025|Module 2: Communication/Mentoring challenges
May 1, 2025|Module 3: Assessing understanding     
May 7, 2025|Module 4: Mentoring Across Difference  


More details coming soon. Please reach out to [Molly Phillips](mailto:mphillips@nceas.ucsb.edu) if you have any questions or issues.
